Class ec.encoding.ContinueDecoding 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.encoding.ContinueDecoding
public class ContinueDecoding
extends Object
implements DecodeResult
A ContinueDecoding is the normal sort of DecodeResult to return from StandardDecoder.decode(). See Decoder for more details.

See Also:
Decoder, StandardDecoder

ContinueDecoding(Object, StandardDecoder)
Construct a ContinueDecoding for the given instance, which uses the given StandardDecoder's decodeBody to finish up instantiation of the object.

decodeBody(Object[])
Implementation of method from ec.encoding.DecodeResult.
getInstance()
Implementation of method from ec.encoding.DecodeResult.

ContinueDecoding 
 public ContinueDecoding(Object theInstance,
                         StandardDecoder theDecoder)
Construct a ContinueDecoding for the given instance, which uses the given StandardDecoder's decodeBody to finish up instantiation of the object.

Parameters:
theInstance - the object to represent
theDecoder - the StandardDecoder to use
